# Get Started Docs

## Get started

- [Get started](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/get-started/index.md): Find out how to get started with the F# programming language.
- [Install F#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/get-started/install-fsharp.md): Learn how to install F# in various different ways.
- [F# in Visual Studio](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/get-started/get-started-visual-studio.md): Learn how to use F# with Visual Studio.
- [F# in Visual Studio Code](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/get-started/get-started-vscode.md): Learn how to use F# with Visual Studio Code and the Ionide plugin suite.
- [F# with the .NET CLI](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/get-started/get-started-command-line.md): Learn how to build a simple multi-project solution on F# using the .NET CLI on any operating system (Windows, macOS, or Linux).
